document.full_text: albert pujols hit a game-ending homer in extra innings for the second straight day, giving st. louis a 2-0 victory over chicago on sunday.
document.title: roundup: another day, another homer: pujols beats cubs again
lines_and_colors: albert pujols hit a game-ending homer in extra innings for the second straight day, giving st. louis a 2-0 victory over chicago on sunday.
